revisionDesc.change: Vote - AcceptText - Accept. See Sosin's comments. Finalizer, beware: this was entered before some rule changes. – The inverted text, at the end, is not a fragment D, but another structural part (I would nearly say another text), so that the structure of the whole text should have two levels, I think: Document A: frg. a - frg. b - frg. c; Document B. Line A1, add numtag to δύο. Line A2, app usually added for κἀμοῦ -> <:καὶ ἐμοῦ|reg|κἀμοῦ:>. Line B2 -> ο̣π̣.1[.1].1[.4]. - Line B4bis should be deleted, and δεῦρο inserted in line B5: τῆς \δεῦρο/ παρουσί̣[ας τ]ῆς (confirmed by introduction). Line B6, end -> τα.1[.?]. Line C4 -> [.?].1άγ̣ονται. Complete line C9: [.?] τ̣οῦτον καὶ τ̣οσουτο[.?] μι.2ον τῆς α̣[.?] vestig \[.?].1ω̣ν/ .2[.2].2α̣[.3]\.4/ <:.3τασ.2ς|alt|ἐ̣ξ̣ε̣τάσε̣ω̣ς:> (dropping the [τῆς?] to deal with the \.4/). C11 -> [.?][ ἀ]ξ̣[ι]ῶ̣. Line "D"3 -> .1ι̣υ̣.5 .1[.?]. Line "D"18 -> ||left:τοῦτο|| (and delete first line D18). Line "D"19 -> "διατετηρημνενον." (final dot, not .1).

Vote - AcceptText - Accept. Lin1--> τῆιδ̣ε̣ <:[.?]|alt:|[τῆι πόλει] [.?]:> ; frA after lin3 add 3. lost.?lin; before lin1 of frB add 1. lost.?lin; frB4--> ἀποδ̣[εδρ][.?]; FrB5--> <:.1|alt:|μ̣:>[.?]; FrB6--> ἐ̣φρό̣ν̣τ̣ισεν̣ [.?].1ς̣; del frB6bis and in lin7--> vestig \[.?].3ε̣.1/; frB9 after lin9 add 9. lost.?lin; frC1 before lin1 add 1. lost.?lin; frClin2--> [.?][ τούτ]ω̣ν; frC6 after lin6 vac.1lin --> 6. lost.?lin; frC7--> vestig ; frC8--> κριτὴς .3; del frC8bis; frC9--> α̣[.?] vestig \[.?].1ω̣ν/; frC9--> .2[.2].2α̣\.4/ <:[.3]; frC11--> [.?][ π]αρα̣δ̣.3; end --> (19, inverse) vac.
Add dummy header for original identifier 'papyri.info/ddbdp/p.ammon;1;18' pointing to new identifier 'papyri.info/ddbdp/p.ammon;2;49'

Entered text of P.Ammon II 49 (olim P.Ammon I 18) from digital copy proofread against print edition. I don't know how to render "Unterlaengen" (lin. c7 at text), "Korrektur" (note at lin. c8) and "Ancora" (note at lin. d5).
changed schema; added xml:space=preserve; indented; moved title/@n to idno
Converted from TEI P4 (EpiDoc DTD v. 6) to P5 (EpiDoc RNG schema)
